headline: Looking At The Narrative For HELLENiQ ENERGY Holdings (ATSE:ELPE) After Mixed Analyst Revisions
summary: The latest research on HELLENiQ ENERGY Holdings points to a slightly revised fair value estimate, edging from €8.78 to about €8.80, alongside a lower discount rate assumption at about 10.16% compared with 10.72% previously. These updates sit against a backdrop of optimism around refining fundamentals on one side and concerns about execution and share price performance on the other, with revenue growth expectations now set at about 39.40% instead of 44.02%. Continue reading to see how you can...
